name: Subriel Matias
bio:
Subriel Matias, also known as "El Orgullo de Maternillo," is a talented professional boxer who was born on March 31, 1992. Standing at a height of 173cm with a reach of 182cm, Matias competes in the super lightweight weight class. With his orthodox stance and impressive physical attributes, he has made a name for himself in the world of boxing.

Matias' journey in boxing began many years ago, and his hard work and dedication have allowed him to achieve great success in the ring. As a top-ranked boxer, Matias has faced tough opponents and showcased his skills to the world. His weight, which is approximately 63.28kg, is carefully managed in order to ensure that he competes in his designated weight class.

One of the things that sets Matias apart from his peers is his ferocious punching power. Being a super lightweight, his explosive knockouts and relentless attacking style have made him a fan-favorite. Matias is known for his aggressive approach and his ability to dictate the pace of the fight, often overwhelming his opponents with a flurry of punches.

His performances inside the ring have earned him accolades and respect from boxing enthusiasts around the globe. Matias has proven time and again that he has what it takes to succeed in the demanding sport of boxing. With his quick reflexes, solid technique, and unwavering determination, he has shown the potential to take his career to new heights.

Matias' nickname, "El Orgullo de Maternillo," translates to "The Pride of Maternillo" in English. This nickname represents his connection to his hometown and the pride he feels in representing his community in the world of professional boxing. It serves as a constant reminder of his roots and the people who have supported him throughout his journey.

Every boxing match that Matias participates in is an opportunity for him to showcase his skills and make a statement in the sport. His fans eagerly await his bouts, knowing that they will witness an exciting display of athleticism and raw power. Matias' fights are often filled with intensity and anticipation, leaving spectators on the edge of their seats.

As a boxing content writer with over 20 years of experience, I have witnessed the rise of many exceptional fighters, and Subriel Matias is undoubtedly one of them. From his impressive record to his knockout power, Matias has all the ingredients necessary to become a boxing superstar.

His journey is still ongoing, and there is no doubt that he will face many more challenges and triumphs along the way. But one thing is for certain – Matias will continue to give it his all and entertain boxing fans with his electrifying performances.

So, whether you're a long-time boxing fan or new to the sport, keep an eye out for Subriel Matias. The "El Orgullo de Maternillo" is a force to be reckoned with, and his fights are guaranteed to leave a lasting impact on all who watch. With his skill, determination, and passion for the sport, Matias is destined to leave a mark in the world of boxing.
